Innovative Event Concepts

This module aims to enable students to understand the event innovation process and learn how to incorporate developing technologies. Throughout this module, students will understand the nature of events innovation and will gain the necessary theoretical and practical knowledge and skills to create innovative event concepts using technology. Specifically, students will explore and reflect about how various forms of technology can be incorporated to support the various stages in the new event development process, such as environmental, organisational and market audits, strategic decision-making, idea generation and screening, and business case development and presentation.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Develop an appreciation of the importance of product innovation within the events sector, and understand the key internal and external influences on successful event innovation.

+  Understand the stages in the new product development process, including creative approaches and creativity techniques, and apply this knowledge to problem-based learning in the events sector, with the support of developing technology.

+  Develop and present the business case for an event with the support developing technologies

+  Reflect on the identification, selection, and use of different technologies and tools employed for new event development purposes.
